items.title: You can still land AirPods Pro 3 in time for Christmas at within $10 of the Amazon all-time low
items.summary:
The AirPods 4 dropped to some wild prices this year, as low as $69 in fact, but for those with their eyes on Apple’s state of the art, that wasn’t all too helpful. We did see Amazon deliver a particularly fantastic $199 post-Black Friday all-time low on AirPods Pro 3 recently, and while that deal is now gone, we have entered the last-minute phase of the holidays and you can still score Apple best earbuds within just $10 of the Amazon all-time low. 

more…

As part of its predecessor PowerCore Reserve by $7. While it carries a $200 MSRP, you can find it starting lower at $170 at Amazon, with discounts over the year having taken the costs as low as $100, most recently during Black Friday through Cyber Monday over two weeks ago. You’re looking at the third-best price we have tracked while the $62 savings last ($92 off the MSRP), only beaten out by that $100 low and $105 rates that sporadically pop up. If you want to go bigger, you can also find the C300 DC and C300 AC 90,000mAh models starting from $162.

items.title: Get premium floor cleaning with roborock’s advanced Saros 10R robot vacuum and mop at its second-ever $1,000 low ($600 off)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, roborock is offering a return to the best rate on its newer Saros 10R Robot Vacuum and Mop back at $999.99 shipped. Normally fetching $1,600 at full price, discounts since its release in February have been very sparse, mostly dropping costs between $1,300 and $1,200 until last month’s Black Friday sale saw the first drop to $1,000. Now, you’re getting a second chance at that all-time low price, giving you one of the brand’s most premium robots with $600 savings. You can also browse the other robots from roborock’s armada that are seeing up to 50% discounts starting from $130.

items.title: Equip your ride with REDTIGER’s F7NP front and rear dash cam + get a FREE 128GB card – all at its $85 low ($45 off)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, you can pick up the popular REDTIGER F7NP Front and Rear 4K Dash Cam w/ FREE 128GB microSD at $85.48 shipped, which is currently slated to arrive well before Christmas. Coming down from $130 here, we saw this rate first appear back during July’s Prime Day event, with that rate repeating regularly in the time since. Whereas we’ve seen the same camera with a 32GB microSD card go a little lower in the past, this package with an even larger 128GB microSD card is landing back at its lowest tracked price with $45 cut from the tag and would make a great gift for any drivers you know who could use the added eyes for bolstered security/protection when the unexpected occurs. You can also shop the brand’s more advanced dash cam systems in its official storefront here.

But if you’re if you’re anything like me – unnecessarily power hungry and mildly paranoid about the how future proof an investment in a 16GB machine is in 2025 – you might be happy to hear that Amazon has knocked $110 off the 24GB Mac mini as of today as well.

items.summary:
Amazon is offering the East Oak 30-inch Electric Smoker with a built-in probe at $249.99 shipped, which will arrive well ahead of Christmas for anyone wanting to secure a last-minute “wow” gift. Coming down from its affordable $300 starting rate, we’ve mostly seen discounts keeping costs above $255, with today’s rate being a repeat that first appeared last month during Black Friday. While we have seen it go as low as $220 in 2024, you’re getting the third-best price of 2025 here, with $50 savings that is only beaten by the short-lived, Prime-exclusive drops to $230 and $242 that both occurred during the small Prime Day windows in July and October.

Buy for $41 (Reg. $60)

What we love

I’ve had a laser level like this in my tool kit for a few years now and it routinely makes hanging just about anything on the wall much easier to do, and do well. This unit can used vertically and horizontally, but also diagonally if you want to hang things going up a staircase.

items.title: Razer’s MX Master ergonomic mouse alternative with RGB hits $75 all-time low
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering Razer’s 2025 Pro Click V2 ergonomic wireless mouse down at $75 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $100 price tag, which it largely held until recently when it dropped to the $80 mark ahead of the Black Friday sale. Today’s deal, however, shaves $25 off its usual going rate, landing it $5 below its previous all-time low and our mention from October. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this mouse, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.summary:

Buy for $13 (Reg. $30)

Automatic 40% discount applied during checkout

While suction cups aren’t inherently hard to put to work, a unit like this with an electric vacuum inside can create a snug fit on smooth surfaces at the push of a button. The price has dropped over and over, so now is a solid time to try it out or to buy as a gift for someone this holiday season.

items.title: Save up to 42% gifting RENPHO devices, like this foot massager with heat at $90, more from $22
items.summary:
Coming to us via its official Amazon storefront, RENPHO is offering up to 42% savings across its lineup of wellness devices, like the Foot Massager with Heat at $89.99 shipped that covers feet up to size 11 in men’s and 12 in women’s sizes. Of course, for folks with larger feet, you can find this variant Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat at $113.97 shipped that covers feet up to 13 in men’s sizes. These foot massagers can sometimes as fetch as much as $140 or so, or a whole lot more than that straight from the brand, but we are looking at some of the lowest prices over the last few months for any last-minute gifting needs. Head below to also check out the other devices seeing discounts right now.

items.title: Last-minute gift deals you can still score for the big day: Apple, Google, kitchen gear, YETI, tech add-ons, more
items.summary:
We are getting down to the wire now folks – there might still be slightly over a week until Santa makes his magical voyage, but we all know UPS and Amazon delivery isn’t nearly as fast as Rudolph. Shipping times are slipping and, perhaps even more importantly, holiday pricing is too. You’re going to want to get on the best gear as soon as you can if you’re hoping to take advantage of both, and we have put together a (relatively) short list of highlights down below. Whether you’re looking land something for a special someone or yourself, now’s the time to get in there.

items.title: Get this Razer Kraken V4 X headset for a Pokémon fan while it’s down to $70 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of its updated video game sale, Woot is offering Razer’s Kraken V4 X Pokémon Edition wired gaming headset for $69.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $100 price tag, and it has been fetching $81 at Amazon since its price dropped ahead of the Black Friday sale. Today’s deal at Woot slashes $30 off its usual going rate, landing it $10 below its previous all-time low to set a new best price to beat. It’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to buy a gift for a gamer who also happens to be a Pokémon fan. Head below for more details.
